summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of 27th Avenue Northwest, from the south margin of West 73rd Street to West 83rd Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7513 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
